title: Finial
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : [Terminal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminal) : Finial**

A kind of [terminal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/terminal) at the end of a [stroke](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/stroke) or [arm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/arm). See also [flourish](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/flourish) and [decoration](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204914/http:/typophile.com/wiki/decoration).
author: James Arboghast
